PluginData.Author: Nerd e1
PluginData.Tooltip: Displays various grid information on HUD.
PluginData.Description:
Mod that displays directional acceleration, current acceleration, hydrogen fuel times, and where your grid/camera is looking as a HUD, albeit defaulted to an off state. To turn on both, do '/togglehud a' and '/togglehud r' the first time you load this mod.
Acceleration values take into account and dynamically update with gravity, listed acceleration will be the acceleration provided when you press the desired key. Negative values mean that direction is not able to counter gravity.
More information coming soonâ„¢
Commands: /togglehud <hud>, toggles the desired HUD on and off. Valid HUDs: 'a'/'sa'/'accel', 'r'/'rot'
/setpos <hud> <x pos> <y pos>, sets desired HUD position to the specified HUD coordinates. X and Y should range from -1 to 1 each, with (0, 0) being the center and (1,1) being top right. Valid HUDs: 'a'/'sa'/'accel', 'r'/'rot'
/setsize <hud> <size>, sets desired HUD text size. Should be larger than zero. Valid HUDs: 'a'/'sa'/'accel', 'r'/'rot'
